meaningMnemonic: In <kanji>defense</kanji> of <kanji>life</kanji>, you have to remain clean. If you are dirty, you will die earlier (think: plagues). So, to defend said life, you must have good <vocabulary>hygiene</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
